item.title: At Least One Former Marvel Star Has Shut Down Rumors Of A Cameo in Deadpool & Wolverine
item.description:
Highlights

  • Deadpool & Wolverine set to feature multiple cameos, sparking speculation about big names involved.
  • Acclaimed actor Brian Cox definitively dismisses rumors of his potential role in the film.
  • Fans eagerly anticipate Stryker’s return, despite Cox confirming he will not reprise the role.

As the premiere of Deadpool & Wolverine approaches, rumors continue to swirl. However, one actor has definitively dismissed all speculation about his participation in the film.

Deadpool & Wolverine , arguably the most anticipated movie of the year, is set to feature numerous cameos, a fact that is no secret. In recent months, rumors have been swirling about these cameo appearances and which big names might be involved. However, one big actor has now put an end to all the speculation surrounding his potential appearance in the upcoming film.

Related
Deadpool 3: 10 Cameos That Could Happen In The MCU Movie
With Deadpool 3 bringing both Deadpool and Wolverine into the MCU, it opens the door for plenty of familiar faces to appear.

In a recent episode of The Starting Line Podcast , host Rich Leigh had the exclusive opportunity to interview acclaimed actor Brian Cox. During their long conversation, which covered a wide range of topics, the subject of Cox's potential involvement in the highly anticipated Deadpool & Wolverine movie arose, particularly regarding the role of William Stryker. Cox swiftly dismissed any rumors, stating, "I haven’t heard about it," thus providing a definitive response to the speculation regarding his involvement in the film.

Cox revealed that following his portrayal of Stryker in X2 (2003) , the role was passed on to his "old friend" Danny Huston, who portrayed the character in 2009's X-Men Origins: Wolverine . Despite wondering why he was not approached to reprise the role, Cox never pursued the matter further. He eventually spoke with David Benioff, the original scriptwriter for X-Men Origins , who simply stated that he did not have an answer. Cox has not been involved in any other Marvel projects since. He explained that he typically moves on from roles after filming, stating, "If they want to do it with another [actor], that's their business." Cox added that even if he were asked to return as Stryker, his busy schedule would prevent him from accepting the role.

Numerous fans have eagerly anticipated Stryker's potential return, praising Cox's portrayal of the villain as irreplaceable. The idea of Stryker's reappearance has sparked excitement among many, although some have voiced skepticism about how his character could be integrated into the storyline. Despite Cox's confirmation that he will not be reprising his role in Deadpool & Wolverine , the possibility of Stryker's return remains shrouded in mystery, leaving fans to speculate about who might step into the role. Stryker's pivotal role in shaping Wolverine's identity makes his presence in the movie seem plausible, particularly given the movie's exploration of Wolverine's past . Furthermore, his ties to Deadpool's backstory add another layer of complexity, further fueling speculation about his potential appearance.

Deadpool & Wolverine is scheduled for theatrical release on July 26, 2024.

More
All Villains Confirmed For Deadpool and Wolverine
With more information having come to light from trailers, these are the villains that have been confirmed to appear in Deadpool and Wolverine.

Source: The Starting Line Podcast | YouTube

item.title: Helldivers 2 Players Make Unexpected Discovery on Terminid Planets After Patch
item.description:
Highlights

  • Helldivers 2 players unearthed massive tunnels on Terminid planets post-patch, sparking speculation about new threats and origins.
  • Players face challenges exploring vast underground tunnels, adding intrigue to Helldivers 2's ongoing narrative and mysteries.
  • Recent Helldivers 2 updates fixed crashes and improved performance, showing Arrowhead's dedication to player feedback.

Helldivers 2 players have found massive tunnels on Terminid planets after the latest patch. Helldivers 2 , a cooperative third-person shooter developed by Arrowhead Game Studios, has gotten a lot of attention for its intense gameplay and ongoing updates. Set in a dystopian future, players battle against alien forces across various planets, facing formidable enemies like Bile Titans, Hive Lords, and plenty more.

The recent update 1.000.301 for Helldivers 2 brought significant improvements, addressing crashes and boosting performance post-update 1.000.300. Despite some logistical challenges, players eagerly embraced the update, which promises a smoother gameplay experience. The two updates being less than a week apart from each other show how dedicated Arrowhead is and how well it listens to the players. Update 1.000.301 is supposed to fix the problems fans faced after update 1.000.300, but looks like it contains new mysteries, too.

Related
Helldivers 2 Update Balances Stratagems, Enemies, Weapons and More
Helldivers 2 update 01.000.300 enhances gameplay with weapon tweaks, enemy adjustments, damage balance and more in response to player feedback.

Speculation About Massive Tunnels in Helldivers 2

Amid the excitement surrounding the latest update and the upcoming Polar Patriots Warbond update for Helldivers 2 , players have stumbled upon mysterious tunnels on Terminid planets. These enormous tunnels, with no ends and no survivors, have sparked speculation about their origins. Some believe they are being dug by the powerful Hive Lords, while others suggest they may signify the future addition of new threats in the game. One thing's for sure, nobody can get out once they fall into the hole.

Comments on the Reddit post indicate that players have encountered remnants of molting Hive Lords and towers coated in bug matter near the tunnels. However, navigating these vast underground tunnels has proven challenging, with some players becoming stuck, including those piloting the massive Patriot Exosuits. The discovery of these tunnels adds an intriguing new element to the ongoing narrative of Helldivers 2 .

Helldivers 2 players are known for their passion for exploration and discovery, constantly seeking out new mysteries within the game. Recently, players on the subreddit devised a new tactic to defeat the Bile Titans in Helldivers 2 . After the latest patch, the community remains actively engaged in unraveling the game's mysteries and overcoming challenges and uncovering hidden secrets.

The success of Helldivers 2 on PC has contributed significantly to its popularity, making it Sony's seventh highest-grossing game in the US market. This achievement shows the game's appeal to a wide audience of players who appreciate its intense cooperative gameplay and dynamic storytelling. As players continue to explore the depths of Helldivers 2 , they eagerly anticipate what new challenges and mysteries await them in the ever-expanding universe.

item.title: Streamer xQc Reacts to How Much Money He's Spent on Steam
item.description:
Highlights

  • xQc discovered he spent $151,000 on Steam, surprising both himself and his viewers.
  • His vast game collection includes nearly 1,000 CS:GO items, some worth over $1,000 each.
  • While his spending may seem excessive, it highlights the lucrative economy of gaming and digital content.

Twitch and Kick streamer xQc was left astounded after discovering the staggering amount of money he has spent on his Steam account. xQc, a prominent figure in the streaming world, boasts millions of followers and a lucrative contract with Kick. His gaming activities on platforms like Steam are closely followed by his fans on Twitch .

Félix Lengyel, famously known as xQc, stands as a leading figure in the streaming world, having an impressive following exceeding 12 million on Twitch, a platform under Amazon's ownership. With such a vast audience, substantial earnings naturally follow, prompting xQc to occasionally offer glimpses into his possessions to his viewers. These glimpses vary from flaunting his collection of luxury watches to splurging substantial sums, occasionally reaching thousands of dollars, in pursuit of elusive in-game treasures. In a recent stream xQc disclosed his highest earnings in a year .

Related
Popular DayZ Server Has Banned xQc
Renowned streamer Félix Lengyel, better known as xQc, gets banned from a popular server of the horror-themed zombie survival game DayZ.

xQc Has Spent $151,000 on Steam Alone

During a recent Twitch stream on April 30, xQc looked into his Steam spending, revealing that he had poured a whopping $151,000 into the platform. This revelation took him by surprise, and his viewers shared in his shock, flooding the chat with disbelief. "I thought it would be much, much less," he confessed. "I thought it would be around $75,000."

A further look into Twitch and Kick streamer xQc 's Steam profile uncovers a vast collection of 813 games, ranging from AAA titles to indie gems. Notably, his inventory in Counter-Strike: Global Offensive includes nearly 1,000 items, with valuable knives fetching prices upwards of $1,000 each.

xQc's reaction highlights the significant financial investment that can accompany a gaming hobby, even for high-profile personalities like himself. It prompts reflection on the broader culture of spending within the gaming community and the pull towards digital goods. These funds basically work as investments for streamers like xQc and bring in sponsorships like xQc's $100 million Kick deal .

While xQc's spending may seem exorbitant to some, it also shows the potential of the thriving economy surrounding gaming and digital content. xQc is already well known for spending large sums on games, add-ons, and other expensive stuff. Just last year, he spent over $9,000 on finding the Lord of the Rings themed Magic the Gathering card. xQc's spending on valuable knives in Counter Strike: Global Offensive isn't the first example either. A lot of players spent huge amounts of money buying the Trinity knife in CS:GO . There are also examples of other streamers like Danny Aarons spending over $40,000 on EA FC24 .

item.title: Genshin Impact Reveals Most Used Spiral Abyss Characters in Update 4.6
item.description:
Highlights

  • New chart reveals the top characters in Spiral Abyss; Furina, Kazuha, and Neuvillette lead the pack with high usage rates.
  • Spiral Abyss features challenging floors with changing enemy lineups, and players must adjust team compositions for success.

A new Genshin Impact chart shows the most popular characters used in the current Spiral Abyss. Version 4.6 has introduced a lot of new content including a brand-new DPS, the Pyro polearm user Arlecchino, also known as The Knave, and the 4th Fatui Harbinger.

Genshin Impact 's Spiral Abyss domain consists of 12 Floors, each harder than the previous one. Every chamber features multiple enemy waves that players need to beat within a certain time frame in order to collect precious rewards. The fact that the Spiral Abyss enemy lineup changes twice a month means that Travelers often need to adjust their team compositions to take advantage of the new enemies' weaknesses.

Related
Genshin Impact Video Leak Shows Clorinde in Dendro Teams
A new Genshin Impact leak reveals how well the new five-star Electro user Clorinde performs when placed in a Dendro team composition.

A Reddit user named Brilliant_Damage986 has posted an interesting chart of the most used characters in the current Phase 1 of the 4.6 Spiral Abyss. According to the data, the most used character in this Abyss is the Hydro Archon Furina, with a usage rate that exceeds 86%. Since her release back in Genshin Impact update 4.2 , Lady Furina has been one of the most powerful characters in the game and the go-to Hydro support for most types of team compositions. Similar to other Archons, one of Furina's greatest strengths is her ability to adapt to almost any party type that needs a strong Hydro applicator.

Genshin Impact: Most Used Characters in 4.6 Spiral Abyss

Many fans were surprised to see that second place on the list was taken by the Anemo sword user, Kaedehara Kazuha. Despite being released in 1.6, Kazuha remains one of the best support characters in Genshin Impact . The fact that he is an Anemo user allows Kazuha to adapt to almost every team composition, since this element cannot interfere with other elemental reactions.

The third spot on the list was also taken by a Hydro character, the five-star catalyst user Neuvillette. At the moment, Neuvillette is considered one of, if not the best, Hydro DPS in Genshin Impact thanks to a stacked kit that revolves around his unique Charged Attack. He is an independent DPS unit, meaning that players often clear out multiple Abyss floors with only Neuvillette in their party.

A lot of comments have pointed out that they expected the new Pyro DPS Arlecchino to be ranked higher on the list. She took the sixth spot on the list with a 70% usage rate. Arlecchino introduced a new mechanic to the game called Bond of Life, which requires players to shift their playstyle. This mechanic won't be exclusive to the Fatui Harbinger, as recent leaks revealed that some upcoming Genshin Impact characters will also rely on the BoL effect.

item.title: Redfall is Still Missing DLC Characters 1 Year After Launch
item.description:
Highlights

  • Many gamers are still waiting for the Redfall DLC they paid $100 for, expressing disappointment in the buggy state of the game.
  • Microsoft Gaming CEO Phil Spencer issued a personal apology for Redfall's launch, promising to reach a more polished state.
  • Despite ongoing updates, players are still missing promised DLC content, leading to frustration among fans awaiting new updates.

Many players are still waiting for the Redfall DLC they spent $100 on. Redfall was positioned to be the next big release from popular developer Arkane Studios. Arkane became well known for games such as Dishonored as well as their more recent release Deathloop , which have both received praise for their unique combat and traversal mechanics.

Arkane’s 2023 release Redfall disappointed many gamers, who described the game at launch as buggy and needing polish overall. The state of Redfall was surprising to many who had come to appreciate a level of quality from Arkane. Despite its disappointing launch, there are plenty of gamers who still see potential in Redfall . Some fans even consider Redfall a good pick on the prospective list of Bethesda TV show adaptation ideas , following the success of Amazon's Fallout series.

Related
Arkane's Upcoming Marvel's Blade Game Could Redeem It After Redfall
Coming completely out of nowhere, Marvel's Blade has just been announced, and it could bring the redemption that Arkane really needs after Redfall.

As Ethan Gach reports on Kotaku , Redfall is still missing content, and there are many players who paid for the $100 Bite Back edition of the game who are upset about this. The DLC in the Bite Back edition of Redfall promised skins and weapon attachments, and access to two future heroes. These DLC heroes have yet to be added to the game, and fan disappointment is growing. One gamer known as rabbi921 spoke to Kotaku and highlighted their dissatisfaction with Redfall as well as the notion of preordering games as a whole.

Redfall Is Still Missing Content

Microsoft Gaming CEO Phil Spencer issued a personal apology about Redfall’ s launch to players, where he noted that he was upset with himself for the way the game turned out. Spencer stated that there were issues with the overall design of the game that did not appeal enough to people, but emphasized a commitment to ensuring that Redfall would reach as polished a state as possible.

Since its launch, Redfall has been updated , including plenty of bug fixes and new content like an additional sniper rifle. Arkane has remained committed to putting out the best version of the game possible, but players are still missing their DLC. There does not appear to be any new statement on when new updates will come, and what they may include.

Players may have to wait a bit longer before they see more updates on Redfall . Arkane Studios is also working on a new Blade game in collaboration with Marvel, and based on the long span of time without updates on Redfall, fans are expecting a long wait before seeing updates on Blade . Many gamers still hope that Redfall will be polished enough to make it worth the while, but some fans would like to see all the content they paid for, first.
